Class SquareTile

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.cascadia.tile.SquareTile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Tile
public final class SquareTile extends Object implements Tile
Represents a square tile in the Cascadia game. A square tile has a single habitat and supports a specific set of animals.
Author:
massinissa

    • centerText

      public static String centerText(String texte, int largeur)
      Centers the given text within a specified width by adding spaces on both sides.
      Parameters:
      texte - The text to be centered (not null).
      largeur - The total width for centering the text.
      Returns:
      A centered string of the specified width
